Title: Directs the commissioner of education to study and report on the provision of services to public school students in grades 8 through 12 by guidance counselors
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to study and report on the provision of services to public school students in grades 8 through 12 by guidance counselors.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the commissioner of education to examine, evaluate and make recommendations on the provision of services by public school guidance counselors to students in grades 8 through 12
